name: Celeb Rush 2 - Bloody Descent with a Celebrity and the Santa Claus Sleigh
name_original: Celeb Rush 2 - Bloody Descent with a Celebrity and the Santa Claus Sleigh
description:
You will love it!

Get your hands on this crazy Santa Claus Sleigh! Scare celebrities to death but do not lose them. You need to deliver at least their heads to get more points.

Want more features? Let us know: skalamandra@gmail.com
